name: Drop Journey
description:
This game was created in 3 days during an internal game jam with Technocité, Belgium.

Embody a drop of rain after you being precipitated from your cloud. Fall from leaves to leaves to get back to the ground, be careful and don't be too reckless, your life is fragile. Collect other drops to compensate the water you lose and above all avoid thorns.

GAME CONTROLS

Android : use your accelerometer
PC : Use directionals arrows
